li.label: Feeling great
li.description: For no apparent reason, I just feel great right now.

li.label: Feeling good
li.description: For no apparent reason, I just feel good right now.

li.label: Feeling bad
li.description: For no apparent reason, I just feel bad right now.

li.label: Feeling terrible
li.description: For no apparent reason, I just feel terrible right now.

li.label: imprisoned
li.description: I hate being locked up.

li.label: sharing bed
li.description: I have to share a bed with someone who I don't particularly want to.

li.label: colonist left unburied
li.description: One of us died and we're just leaving them lying in the open. Nobody should be left like that. People deserve a decent burial.

li.label: naked
li.description: I'm naked. This is humiliating.

li.label: in a little pain
li.description: Ow... That hurts.

li.label: in a moderate amount of pain
li.description: Ughhh... When will it end?

li.label: experiencing acute pain
li.description: Make it stop... make it stop... make it stop...

li.label: in shock from exceptional pain
li.description: AAAAAHHH! Kill me now!

li.label: psychic emanator soothe
li.description: The psychic emanator makes me feel strange, but also very relaxed.

li.label: psychic soothe (medium)
li.description: It's like a calming voice at the back of my mind, soothing me, settling my nerves.

li.label: psychic drone (low)
li.description: It's like a scratching at the back of my mind. A voice, whispering. I can only make out a few words, and I don't like them.

li.label: psychic drone (medium)
li.description: I feel like someone is always just out of sight, speaking to me. The voice changes but the message doesn't. I'm supposed to hurt people. Make it go away!

li.label: psychic drone (high)
li.description: The voice is unbearably loud. It's hard to concentrate. I find myself talking back to it, yelling at it. But it just keeps shouting!

li.label: psychic drone (extreme)
li.description: My heart pounds and I'm sweating. All I can think of is hurting and suffering and all these enemies around me. They're my nightmare, my nightmare, my nightmare...

li.label: joywire
li.description: It feels amazing.

li.label: beautiful aurora
li.description: The view is amazing.
